title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank appoints M.D. Ramesh Murthy as Chief Financial Officer - Moneycontrol
content: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank appoints M.D. Ramesh Murthy as Chief Financial Officer  Moneycontrol
description: Murthy joins Ujjivan SFB from Karur Vysya Bank where he was the CRO and subsequently, the CFO, leading and directing the Finance, Accounts, Analytics & MIS, Tax and Regulatory functions of the Bank.
